make[2]: Map '/home/bene/prj/pyformex/pyformex/lib' wordt binnengegaan
gcc -g -DNDEBUG -O3 -Wall -Wstrict-prototypes -fPIC -I/usr/include -I/usr/include/python2.6 -I/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/numpy/core/include -c nurbs_module.c
gcc -shared nurbs_module.o -L/usr/lib -o nurbs_module.so
rm nurbs_module.o
make[2]: Map '/home/bene/prj/pyformex/pyformex/lib' wordt verlaten
